text:
is a Japanese female athlete. She is best known as an association football player.
Iwashimizu played in the 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup; and she was a member of the Japan women's national football team that won the 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup.
She was a member of the women's team in the 2008 Summer Olympics at Beijing. She played on the team which won a silver medal in the 2012 Summer Olympics at London.
